name: You Are Not The Hero
blurb: A new action platform RPG, inspired by all the people the heroes always ended up screwing over. Stupid heroes...

rewards.reward:
Village Lunatic Tier!

Access to backer only surveys, game input, reward tiers and stretch goal input.
Receive two HD wallpapers for your desktop!
Shady Dealer Tier!\r\n\r\nEarly Adopter! Receive a digital DRM-free copy of the game, or a steam key (if possible) upon release. All previous rewards included.

Pub Patron Tier!\r\n\r\nReceive a digital DRM-free copy of the game, or a steam key (if possible) upon release. Includes a beautifully illustrated digital instruction booklet. All previous rewards included.

Sneaky Informant Tier!

Gain access to a playable pre-Alpha build of a condensed Chapter 1 and 2 after the campaign!
All previous rewards included.
Sneaky Mechanic Tier! Gain special access to beta-test custom mechanics and quests throughout development! Help polish the game to a nice Mr.Miyagi sheen. All previous rewards included.
Master Mechanic Tier!\r\n\r\nGain special access to test custom mechanics and quests throughout development! Help polish the game to a nice Mr.Miyagi sheen. All previous rewards included.

Opera Singer Tier!

Get a digital copy of the YANTH complete Soundtrack plus backer only tracks and a fully illustrated digital artbook!
All previous rewards included.

Red Barrels Do Explode Tier!\r\n============================\r\n Have your own personal gravestone! Include a special line for those you've left behind. In good taste, of course... All previous rewards minus limited rewards included.

Annoying Follower Tier!

Become an NPC in the game! Create your own lines, we'll make a sprite and bust with your general likeness.
All previous rewards included.

Local Merchant Tier! Get a fully illustrated physical box of the game with an illustrated DVD, a physical manual, and an extra Steam key (if possible) All previous rewards minus limited rewards included.

Local Militia Tier! ============================  \r\nReceive the NPC Life T-Shirt in Black! Available in mens or womens sizes. All previous rewards minus limited rewards included.\r\nThis reward is only included in this tier, the Forest Hermit Tier, and the Town Mayor Tier. Please see add-ons if you want a shirt without changing tiers!

Fancy Noble Tier!

Become an NPC with a custom sprite and bust art designed after you!
Receive 2 digital copies  or keys of the game.
All previous rewards minus limited rewards included.

Stuck in a Cave Tier!

Star in your very own side quest! Be an NPC with a custom sprite, bust and short storyline! Name up to 3 other NPCs with general likeness. Receive 3 copies of the game.
All previous rewards minus limited rewards included.

Took The Red Pill Tier! \r\n============================ \r\nStar in your very own side quest! Be an NPC with a custom sprite, bust and short storyline! Name up to 3 other NPCs with general likeness. Have your own custom track composed by DesperateMeasurez! Receive 2 physical copies and 1 digital copy of the game. All previous rewards minus limited rewards included.

Not A Hero Tier! ============================ \r\n Receive a High-Quality Illustrated Poster of yourself!* Add $100 for the original illustration on paper, autographed! Includes a custom NPC sprite and bust art designed after you! Receive 3 physical copies of the game. All previous rewards minus limited rewards included.

Forest Hermit Tier!

Design a quest area! We'll send you a copy of the game engine via Steam and send you the resources to make a map. I'll teach you the basics and we'll design a map together, including a custom NPC sprite and bust art designed after you! Name up to 5 other NPCs with general likeness. Details to the left.
Receive 5 digital copies or keys of the game.
All previous rewards minus limited rewards included. Please message me for details first~

Town Mayor Tier!
============================ 
Design a town and become a mayor! We'll send you a copy of the game engine via Steam and send you the resources to make a town. I'll teach you the basics and we'll design a map together, including a custom NPC sprite and bust art designed after you!
Get up to 5 NPCs with name, custom sprites and busts, and another 5 NPCs with name and general likeness. Details to the left.
Receive 7 physical copies and 3 digital copies or keys of the game, Intl. shipping included!
All previous rewards PLUS limited rewards included. Please message me for details first~
